page.title: 06MEDIA
page.content: {NEWSPAPERS} In our area we have the editor of a newspaper the NorthantÂ£s Post and his wife who is called Mrs. Boullimere also works for the post. The post sells 204,300 copies a week and 140 people work for the post.The post has been around for ten years.Mrs Boullimere once worked for the Sun and the Express which sell over 4 million copies a day Both of these are national daily papers other publications in our area are the Chronical & Echo,the Mercury & Herald and anumber of magazines RADIO A number of local radio stations broadcast to the area.B.B.C Radio Northampton,and Hereward Radio being two
